text:
Hey @kroger: I scheduled AND CONFIRMED an appt for a #COVID19 #vaccine at the Lake Zurich, IL @MarianosMarket for 5:15 p.m. today. 

Appt confirmation email was sent to me at 9:48 am. today.

So, please: Explain this below. How could you cancel this.. w/out cause.. BY EMAIL?! https://t.co/VVRpo7ibMV
